text: That Evening Sun is a 2009 movie based on a 2002 short story I Hate to See That Evening Sun Go Down by William Gay. The movie is produced by Dogwood Entertainment. It stars Hal Holbrook as Abner Meecham and is directed by Scott Teems who also wrote the screenplay. Dixie Carter and Mia Wasikowska are also in the cast. The movie received positive reviews and many enjoyed Holbrook's performance. Category:2009 movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies
